original_text: I clearly warned your ancestors that they must obey me. I warned them many times since I brought them safely out of Egypt. I have continued to do that, even until today.
korean_text: 내가 너희 조상들을 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 날부터 오늘까지 간절히 경계하며 끊임없이 경계하기를 너희는 내 목소리를 순종하라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: since I brought them safely out of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 안전하게 이집트에서 이끌어낸 이래

sentences.original_text: I have continued to do that
